song_name: The Patron Saint of Liars and Fakes
lyrics:
23 contributorsthe patron saint of liars and fakes lyricsverse 1
im holding out and im holding on
to every letter and every song
i wrote myself out of the day we ever had to meet
are you through with me

chorus
so and when it all goes to hell will you be able to tell
me sorry with a straight face
and when it all goes to hell will you be able to tell
me sorry with a straight face lets go

verse 2
im all ears and im all scars
to hear you tell me boys like you you try too hard
to look not quite as desperate im hanging on
but i still know the way to make your makeup run

chorus
so and when it all goes to hell will you be able to tell
me sorry with a straight face
and when it all goes to hell will you be able to tell
me sorry with a straight face

bridge
and when it all goes to hell will you be able to tell
me sorry with a straight face
and when it all goes to hell will you be able to tell
take this to your grave
me sorry with a straight face
and ill take it to mine
see fall out boy liveget tickets as low as 20you might also likeoutro
and when it all goes to hell
and when it all goes to hell
and when it all goes to hell
